data.name: Hazel Sky Demo
data.detailed_description:
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/DetailPage01.png

This demo starts as Shane is sent to an island far from home in the flying city of Gideon, he must pass the trials and return as an Engineer or face banishment.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/DetailPage02.png
data.about_the_game:
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/DetailPage01.png

This demo starts as Shane is sent to an island far from home in the flying city of Gideon, he must pass the trials and return as an Engineer or face banishment.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/DetailPage02.png
data.short_description: Experience the first few minutes of the upcoming heartfelt adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
